description: Create or remove a distributed vSwitch

username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.

datacenter_name.description: The name of the datacenter that will contain the dvSwitch

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

discovery_proto.description: Link discovery protocol between Cisco and Link Layer discovery

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.

switch_name.description: The name of the switch to create or remove

uplink_quantity.description: Quantity of uplink per ESXi host added to the switch
